pullRequest.title: Implement instrumenting user defined functions
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose

Introduce Observable annotation to observe user-defined functions

Check List

[✓ ] Read the Contributing Guide
[ ✓] Added necessary tests

[✓ ] Integration Tests

commit.message: Introduce Observable annotaion to instrument user defined functions
Add tests for observability in user defined functions
